localMashup.name: üìÇ Local Mashup
localMashup.description:
Use this method to create mashups from maps stored on your PC.
Enjoy random mashups with filtering or create a mashup of two songs of your choice.

‚ùó Recommended if you have a library of at least 10,000 songs.

chimuMoeMashup.name: ‚ù§Ô∏è Chimu.moe Mashup
chimuMoeMashup.description: Use Chimu.moe to create exciting mashups. Discover new combinations using this method.

osuApiMashup.name: osu!api Mashup
osuApiMashup.description: Create mashups using the osu!api. Combine your favorite tracks and enjoy the music fusion.

settings.newValue: value for this filter (or leave empty to disable it)

setSettings.setOsuPath: Set your osu! Songs path. Example: C:\Users\User\AppData\Local\osu!\Songs\
setSettings.setFirstMapPath: Set your first desired map path. Example: C:\osu!\Songs\1094694 Hirose Kohmi - promise\
setSettings.setSecondMapPath: Set your second desired map path. Example: C:\osu!\Songs\1529141 Ata - I'm Not Crazy\
setSettings.writeValInSeconds: Write a value in seconds. Example: 120 (for 2 minutes)
setSettings.noDifficulties: No difficulties found for this map.

filter.localFilterLeeway: ‚ö†Ô∏è  Keep in mind that local filters have a some leeway to optimise the search.
